hero.title: Full Stack Developer
hero.subtitle: Specialized in ‚Äúwhy do we do it this way?‚Äù
hero.description: I design and develop modern web applications, with a particular focus on code quality, technical choices, and architecture (The portfolio does not countü§≠)

about.title: Who am I ?
about.description1: A passionate developer with four years of experience, I began my career at ESN, working on a wide variety of projects and in diverse contexts. This diversity has allowed me to gain experience in many areas: front-end, back-end, DevOps, web, mobile, as well as low-code and no-code solutions.
about.description2: I approach each project with a pragmatic and curious mindset, seeking above all to understand the need and make coherent technical choices. I also use AI as a development aid tool when it makes sense, while ensuring that I remain fully involved in my projects rather than simply observing them.
about.description3: Outside of development, I cultivate my other passions, ranging from digital culture to gastronomy.

experiences.description: Integration of a white-label Keycloak authentication system: registration process, login and password management, with development of custom authenticators.

Development of a web interface integrated with cash registers allowing consultation and updating of customer information as well as the creation of loyalty cards, with rendering via WebView and addition of a virtual keyboard.
Implementation of a new subscription offer with role-based user access management via Keycloak, integrated with existing offers and delivered within a tight deadline.
Development of a mobile application for journalists to upload videos, including compression and sending to external platforms.
Design of a tenant journey for submitting applications (account creation, completing the application) and back-office development with filters and processing of submitted data.

project.title: Recent work
project.description: A selection of my most recent projects, demonstrating my expertise in modern web development.

projects.description: Digital platform for discovering and booking activities, with secure payment and user management.
Instant alerts when external services (Stripe, AWS, Vercel, etc.) go down, your SSL certificate expires, or your API slows down.
Educational project aimed at testing and documenting each Vitest feature through simple, concrete use cases.

contact.title: Let's work together
contact.description: Got a project idea? Have a question? Feel free to reach out to me. I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
